report_json.text: Computer science covers various areas that are essential when understanding and developing technology. It includes understanding how computer works, designing efficient ways to solve problems using algorithms and data structures and creating software using different programming languages.
report_json.summary: Computer science encompasses essential areas for understanding and developing technology, including computer workings, algorithm design, and software creation.

report_json.text: Computer scientists also study the building block of computer and their structure along with areas like software engineering, artificial intelligence, computer network, databases and how humans interact with computer. Additionally, computer science explores computer graphics, operating system and numerical calculations.
report_json.summary: Computer scientists study computer structure, software engineering, artificial intelligence, computer networks, databases, human-computer interaction, computer graphics, operating systems, and numerical calculations.

report_json.text: All these fields contribute to different aspects of technology and its applications.
report_json.summary: These fields contribute to various aspects of technology and its applications.

topic.title: Describe the different fields within computer science.

report_json.summary: In the 17th century, people began creating machines like calculators to perform mathematical tasks.

report_json.text: William Schikers and God-Free Lebanese developed machine calculators and Charles Babbage designed early programmable machines including the analytical engine.
report_json.summary: These innovations laid the groundwork for modern computers by introducing concepts like punched cards for programming.

report_json.text: In the 19th century, Harmon Hallorith created tabular iterators for statistical tasks, leading to machines that could do more than just mathematical calculations.
report_json.summary: By the mid 20th century, powerful computers like any act emerged shifting the meaning of the world computer to machines rather than human calculators.

report_json.text: The institutions like IBM please significant role establishing labs and paving the ways for computer science as an academic discipline by the mid 20th century.
